tls:text.tls:line: (I am) a scion of the High Lord Gāo Yáng,

and in the beginning he conferred on me a distinguished name.

Springs and autumns sped by in endles alternation:

why will you not make improvements to this standard of conduct?

Come, I shall guide you, won't you; I shall lead the way.

tls:text.tls:line: The Three Sovereigns of old in their purity

tls:text.tls:line: The Three Sovereigns of old in their purity
were the ones with whom all the world's fragrances took their abode.
They brought together pepper and cinnamon;

sense.def: cause to get mixed up> mix up, bring together : 故先王以土与金木水火，以成百物

tls:text.tls:line: They brought together pepper and cinnamon;

since they kept to the right Way and found the right Road.

precisely because they made convenient use of shortcuts and (in the end) got nowhere.

tls:text.tls:line: precisely because they made convenient use of shortcuts and (in the end) got nowhere.

tls:text.tls:line: Quickly I raced about, went forward and towards the back.

Come the sleek, happy face, and lusty, sanguine health:

tls:text.tls:line: 85 A body that will maintain fitness to ripe old age.

sense.def: body as a whole; especially the main trunk as opposed to the head; body as embodying the person

tls:text.tls:line: 90 Watching over the young and meek, upholding the orphan and the widow.
Your benignity falls on all classes of men; glorious are your rich favours;
Dread goes before you; peaceful arts follow you; the beauty of your goodness is manifest.

sense.def: civil flexibility (as opposed to militarist severity)

tls:text.tls:line: 105 O soul, come back, and let the state be ruled!

sense.def: 我國家the nation including its leading clans; our nation, my nation, the nation in question, the polity; their nation

tls:text.tls:line: The princes are all assembled; the Nine Ministers have taken their places;

sense.def: all; completely; exhaustively; all one after the other
